job_description:
Automation Test Engineer

Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd Location: Module No:2306, Third Floor, Yamuna, Tower II, Technopark Phase III, SEZ Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695581 Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Application Closing Date: November 18, 2025 Job Published Date: November 09, 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company with over 17 years of experience, providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans across numerous technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, Vue, catering to diverse industry verticals globally.

What’s Important to Us:

We are seeking a skilled Automation Test Engineer with a strong background in software testing and a minimum of 4 years of hands-on automation experience. The ideal candidate will possess robust technical skills in test automation frameworks, excellent communication abilities, and a proactive, positive attitude. Leadership qualities and the ability to collaborate effectively within cross-functional teams are crucial for success in this role.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust automated test scripts and frameworks for web, mobile, and API testing.
  • Collaborate with developers, QA, and product teams to ensure high-quality releases.
  • Execute automated and manual tests to validate system functionality, performance, and reliability.
  • Integrate automated test suites into CI/CD pipelines (e.g., Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps).
  • Perform root cause analysis on failed tests and report defects with detailed logs and evidence.
  • Continuously enhance automation coverage and improve test efficiency.
  • Contribute to test strategy, planning, and estimation activities.
  • Mentor junior team members and share best practices for automation and testing processes.

Preferred Skills:

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in software testing (manual + automation).
  • Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience with popular automation tools such as: Playwright, Selenium, Cypress, Appium, TestNG, Postman, RestAssured, Robot Framework, or Katalon Studio.
  • Proficiency in at least one programming language: Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, or C#.
  • Strong understanding of QA methodologies, SDLC, STLC, and defect management processes.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Git/GitHub, and Test Management tools (e.g., TestRail, Zephyr, Azure Test Plans).
  • Good exposure to API testing and automation.
  • Experience in Agile/Scrum environments.

Additional Preferred Skills:

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Strong leadership and mentoring abilities.
  • Demonstrated proactiveness, ownership, and a positive attitude.
  • Experience in performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of cloud-based testing (AWS, Azure, or Docker-based environments) is desirable.

Qualification Required:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • A fun, family-friendly environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various bonus programs (training hours, certifications, contributions to business via ideas/innovation).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.
summary: Seeking a skilled Automation Test Engineer with 4+ years of experience. Responsibilities include script development, CI/CD integration, and mentoring. Offers growth, benefits, and work-life balance.

job_description:
Digital Marketing/Graphic Designer (Male Candidates Only)

Company: HYZ VENTURES INTL (P) Ltd Address: GE, Ground Floor, Padmanabham, Technopark, Karyavattom P O, TVPM, 695581 Website: http://www.hyzventures.com

Closing Date: 25 November 2025 Job Published: 08 November 2025 Contact Email: hr@hyzventures.com

Key Responsibilities:

  • Responsible for the overall layout and product design for a wide range of applications such as advertisements, brochures, websites, and magazines.
  • Work with specialized software like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop to create designs.
  • Select fonts, color schemes, and other design elements to create compelling and effective visuals.
  • Responsible for Video editing and design logos.
  • SEO for Websites.
  • Rectifying errors on Ads Campaigns.
  • Posting content on YouTube.
  • Work with other professionals like copywriters, editors, and videographers to create a cohesive final product.

Preferred Skills:

  • Organic posting (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter/X)
  • Paid social media ads (targeted campaigns)
  • Social media contests & campaigns
  • Paid Advertising (PPC)
  • Social media ads (Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc.)
  • Solid knowledge of Google tools, SEO practices, and basic HTML/CSS
  • Strong writing and editing skills with a focus on SEO optimization
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to meet deadlines
  • Basic knowledge in content creation using tools like Canva or AI platforms

Experience & Qualifications:

  • Years of Experience: 1 to 3 years
  • Preferred Technical Qualification: Professionally trained candidates
  • Preferred Academic Qualification: Plus Two / Graduation preferred

Application Instructions: Interested candidates are requested to send their resumes to hr@hyzventures.com with the subject "Digital Marketing/Graphic Designer".
summary: Seeking a Male Digital Marketing/Graphic Designer with 1-3 years of experience. Responsibilities include graphic design, video editing, SEO, and managing ad campaigns.

job_title: Female Customer Support Executive (Tamil and Malayalam Speaking)
job_description:
Female Customer Support Executive (Tamil and Malayalam Speaking)

Organization: Integrated Order Automated Solutions Pvt Ltd Company Location: Technopark Trivandrum Website: www.ioas.in Contact Email: ioascareers@gmail.com

Job Published: 08, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 30, Nov 2025

Position Overview

Integrated Order Automated Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is seeking a Female Customer Support Executive for their Pharma Based IT / Software division. This role is open to both freshers and experienced candidates. Fluency in both Tamil and Malayalam is a mandatory requirement.

Responsibilities

  • Oversee the sales process to attract new clients.
  • Research and identify new market opportunities.
  • Generate new business through Phone, Whatsapp, etc.
  • Prepare and deliver pitches to potential clients.
  • Maintain regular communication with management to successfully execute business strategy.
  • Develop and maintain long-term client relationships through excellent PR skills.
  • Independently manage the sales process.

Qualifications and Requirements

  • Qualification: Degree
  • Language: Candidate must be fluent in both Tamil and Malayalam.
  • Experience: Fresher / Experienced (Females)

Compensation and Working Conditions

  • Salary: ₹8000 to ₹12000. Exceptional candidates with proven skills and experience may expect a higher salary package, to be discussed during the interview.
  • Time: 9 AM - 6 PM (Monday to Saturday)
  • Probation Period: 6 Months
  • Increment: Performance-based increment after probation.

How to Apply

Interested candidates are requested to send their resume to ioascareers@gmail.com. Please use the subject line: "Customer Support Executive With Tamil".

Company Address: Integrated Order Automated Solutions (P) Ltd Kerala Startup Mission, G3B, Thejaswini, Technopark Rd, Technopark Campus, Karyavattom, Thiruvananthapuram, 695581
summary: Female Customer Support Executive needed for Pharma IT/Software roles. Requires Tamil and Malayalam fluency. Open to freshers and experienced candidates.

job_title: Female Customer Support Executive (with accountancy background preferred)
job_description:
Female Customer Support Executive (Pharma Based IT / Software)

Organization: Integrated Order Automated Solutions Pvt Ltd Company Location: Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala Website: www.ioas.in

Closing Date: 30 November 2025 Job Published: 08 November 2025

Contact Email: ioascareers@gmail.com

Position Overview

Integrated Order Automated Solutions (P) Ltd is seeking a Female Customer Support Executive with a preference for candidates having an accountancy background. This role is within the Pharma Based IT / Software sector.

Responsibilities:

  • Oversee the sales process to attract new clients.
  • Monitor online payments and perform subscription entries.
  • Handle basic accounting tasks.
  • Research and identify new market opportunities.
  • Generate new business through Phone, Whatsapp, etc.
  • Prepare and deliver pitches to potential clients.
  • Maintain regular communication with management to successfully execute business strategy.
  • Utilize excellent PR skills to build long-term relationships with clients.
  • Independently manage the sales process.

Qualifications and Skills:

  • Qualification: Degree
  • Preferred Skills: Degree with an accountancy background is preferred.
  • Experience: Fresher / Experienced (Females)
  • Language Proficiency: Malayalam, English, and Tamil speaking preferred.

Compensation and Benefits:

  • Salary: 10,000 to 14,000 (Exceptional candidates with proven skills and experience can expect a higher salary package, to be discussed during the interview).
  • Working Hours: 9 AM - 6 PM (Monday to Saturday)
  • Probation Period: 6 Months
  • Increment: Performance-based increment after probation.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates should send their resume to ioascareers@gmail.com. Please use 'Customer Support Executive With Accountancy' as the subject line of your email.

Company Address: Kerala Startup Mission, G3B, Thejaswini, Technopark Rd, Technopark Campus, Karyavattom, Thiruvananthapuram, 695581
summary: Seeking a Female Customer Support Executive for pharma IT. Responsibilities include sales, payment monitoring, and basic accounting. Degree required; accountancy background preferred.

job_description:
Process Associate Trainee (Freshers)

Company: ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd

Address: 4th FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581

Website: https://www.ecesistech.com

Contact Email: amrithas@ecesistech.com

Job Published: 08, Nov 2025

Closing Date: 11, Nov 2025

Work Location: 5CCJ+GJ7, Saraloor Rd, Chenthooran Nagar, Nagercoil, Tamil Nadu 629002 (Google Map: https://maps.app.goo.gl/c4aYgkukM6EiyHiT6?g_st=iw)

About Ecesis:

At Ecesis, we specialize in Broker Price Opinion (BPO) services that empower real estate professionals across the United States. We are a trusted leader in the real estate valuation industry, recognized for our precision, reliability, and innovative solutions. Ecesis is proud to be the only IT firm in Kerala to have received Government funding under the India BPO Promotion Scheme (IBPS) for employment generation in 2018 and is a NASSCOM-affiliated organization.

What We Do:

For over a decade, Ecesis has been a trusted partner to realtors, brokers, and real estate companies, providing accurate property valuations and Comparative Market Analysis (CMA) reports. Our team combines data-driven insights with advanced technology to deliver results that help clients stay informed and competitive.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Support daily operations and documentation.
  • Coordinate with teams to ensure smooth workflow.
  • Maintain accuracy and efficiency in all assigned tasks.
  • Contribute to process improvement initiatives.

Eligibility Criteria:

  • Willing to work in night shifts (allowances provided).
  • Freshers preferred from in and around Marthandam.
  • Eligible Courses: Graduates / Postgraduates in Engineering (Civil, ECE, EEE, ME) or Arts & Science.
  • Batch: 2024–2025 only.
  • Immediate joiners required.

Preferred Skills:

  • Strong attention to detail and ability to handle large volumes of data accurately.
  • Good understanding of documentation and report preparation.
  • Ability to multitask and meet tight deadlines.
  • Eagerness to learn business processes and adapt quickly to new tools or systems.
  • Basic knowledge of the real estate domain or BPO process (added advantage).
summary: Ecesis seeks freshers for Process Associate Trainee roles in Nagercoil. Responsibilities include supporting operations and documentation. Night shifts required for 2024-2025 graduates.
